column1: Little Goat Diner////While it was a nice brunch/lunch
column2: I can't justify spending $40 on 2 people unless it was some special occasion. Thus
column3: minus 1 star for value. If you're from out of town
column4: the streets are kind of strange there and parking is probably 1/2 a block down where they have the pay-to-park stations. I'd probably come back in the future
column5: just that there are so many other unique breakfast options in Chi town I've got to try before stumbling back here again.
